EditProfileDialog.looking_for_team_desc: This makes you visible in the player market.
EditProfileDialog.skills_roles_desc: Select up to 2 roles for your primary game.

TeamsPage.delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your team and all its data. Your role will be reverted to 'player'.

TeamsPage.join_requests_desc: Review players who want to join your team.
TeamsPage.default_join_message: I'd like to join your team!

MemberManager.kick_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. {name} will be permanently removed from your team.

EditTeamDialog.looking_for_players_desc: Enable this to list your team on the market.
EditTeamDialog.required_roles_desc: Select the specific roles your team needs.

TournamentsPage.title: Tournaments
TournamentsPage.subtitle: Compete for glory and prizes.
TournamentsPage.no_tournaments_subtitle: Check back later for upcoming events.

TournamentDetailsPage.bracket_coming_soon_desc: The tournament bracket will be generated once teams are registered and seeded.
TournamentDetailsPage.founder_only_register: Only the team founder, an admin, or a moderator can register the team.

ProposeTournamentDialog.title: Propose a New Tournament
ProposeTournamentDialog.description: Fill out the details for your tournament idea. Our staff will review it for approval.
ProposeTournamentDialog.name: Tournament Name
ProposeTournamentDialog.desc_rules_placeholder: Describe your tournament, including rules, prize pools, stream links, etc.

TournamentGuideDialog.title: Tournament Format Guide
TournamentGuideDialog.description: Learn about the different tournament formats available.
TournamentGuideDialog.single_elim_desc: The fastest way to a champion. In this high-stakes format, a single loss means your team is out of the tournament. It's a pure knockout system, perfect for large events where time is of the essence.
TournamentGuideDialog.double_elim_desc: A format that rewards resilience. Every team gets a second chance. After your first loss, you drop to the 'Lower Bracket' to fight your way back. Lose again, and you're eliminated. The winners of the Upper and Lower Brackets face off in the Grand Final.
TournamentGuideDialog.round_robin_desc: The most comprehensive test of skill. Every team plays against every other team in their group at least once. Standings are determined by total wins, making it a true measure of consistency. Ideal for smaller groups to find a clear top team.
TournamentGuideDialog.swiss_system_desc: A balanced, non-eliminating format perfect for large fields of competitors. In each round, you're paired against an opponent with the same or a very similar win-loss record. This ensures competitive matches throughout the event without needing to play everyone.

MessagesPage.no_conversations: You have no conversations. Add friends from the market to start chatting.
MessagesPage.select_chat_subtitle: Choose a conversation from the list to start chatting.
MessagesPage.block_confirm_desc: This action is irreversible. You will not be able to send or receive messages from this user and they will be removed from your friends list.
MessagesPage.delete_history_desc: This will permanently delete all messages in this conversation for both participants. This action cannot be undone.
MessagesPage.remove_friend_desc: This will remove this user from your friends list and the chat history will be permanently deleted. To chat again, you will need to send a new friend request.

AdminPanel.title: Admin Dashboard
AdminPanel.subtitle: Global control panel for SquadUp platform management.
AdminPanel.user_management_desc: View, edit, ban, and manage all users.
AdminPanel.team_management_desc: Oversee and delete teams if necessary.
AdminPanel.analytics_dashboard_desc: View sign-ups, revenue, and platform metrics.
AdminPanel.user_management_page_desc: Oversee all registered users in the platform.

ModPanel.user_management_desc: View, ban, and manage all users.
ModPanel.support_tickets_desc: View and respond to user support requests.
ModPanel.chat_moderation_desc: Review chat logs for rule violations.
ModPanel.user_management_page_desc: Oversee all registered users in the platform.
ModPanel.manage_tournaments_desc: View, edit, or delete existing tournaments.

TournamentManagement.delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the tournament "{name}".
TournamentManagement.no_tournaments_desc: There are no approved tournaments to manage right now.

ScrimsPage.subtitle: Find a practice match or post one for your team.

ScrimsPage.notes_placeholder: e.g., Diamond+ only, looking for IGL...
ScrimsPage.scrim_posted_desc: Your scrim is now listed for other teams to accept.
ScrimsPage.scrim_accepted_desc: You have accepted the scrim. It will now appear on your team calendar.
ScrimsPage.scrim_cancelled_desc: The scrim has been removed from the listing.
